1.14.2:
- Fix a style error in the editor in dark mode

- Fix wrong initialization value for code editor language selection

- Fix code editor initialization exception in non-chrome browsers
1.14.0: - Fix code editor not loading correctly in some cases Thanks to @smart_stupid @acstor for the feedback!
1.13.0:
> **This update synchronizes changes from Codeforces Better v1.68 - 1.74 to AtCoder Better**



- Added button to jump to VJudge

- Added "beautify code block" feature to replace pre code blocks on the page with monaco editor. This will also improve the display of code in dark mode

- Improved each request method of Clist Rating to solve the problem of not getting the data correctly

- Improved the prompt for ChatGPT translations and fixed a possible injection error that could lead to incomplete translations

- Improved the code related to the LaTeX Replacement/Reduce, which can now restore correctly in the case of multiple nesting restore correctly

- Enhance robustness of website localization methods

- Tweak code related to dark mode to use variables for consistent style and management

- Replace CDN staticfile.org with staticfile.net

- Fix issue on question list page where clist ratings for some questions may be displayed as not found



- Fix issue with clist scores displaying abnormally on question set pages

- Fix issue where diff comparison styles are not aligned in code online tests

- Fix issue where deepl 429 reports an error and doesn't display the alert message correctly

- Fix issue where clist rating may be displayed as not found on question pages

- Fix issue where Logu jump method reports an error in older versions of Tampermonkey



- Fix issue where MathJax library file is not loaded correctly, which can cause an unexpected error. MathJax library files were not loaded correctly, an unexpected dead loop would occur causing the page to get stuck

- Fixed DeepL free mode translations not displaying the in-translation prompt message correctly

- Fixed scripts that might not load correctly

- Fixed typos between adjacent LaTeX formulas that could be broken



- Some other tweaks and improvements



------



- Separate website localization data to external JSON for maintenance

- Scripts support internationalization while using the crowdin platform to automate localization efforts

- Replaced some buttons with icon buttons

- Added support for the DeepL API, including the official api-free, api-pro, and deeplx, thanks to @Vistarin for the suggestion

- Added support for the deepl and chatgpt configuration balance queries, note that this also requires you to have the Note that this also requires your service provider to support and provide the corresponding API

- Add support to judge the text before translation, if it looks like a code snippet, it will not be translated automatically, and there will be a popup window to remind you before clicking translate

- Add the function of selecting the target language of the translation service

- Add the about page, as well as the options of updating channel, updating source

- Add the page of debugging and maintenance, including cache refreshing, data clearing, import and export - Add the customization options - Add the customization options, including official api-free, api-pro and deeplx. Export

- Add customization optionsï¼š "'Code editor submit button position", default is at the bottom, thanks to @lishufood's suggestion

- Improve each loading function, remove some unnecessary waiting relationships, speed up script loading time

- Improve the methods related to the translation function, as well as the way of displaying the error message

- Improve the performance of the auto-translation, as well as the problem of the automatic translation that may not be able to Auto-translate issue

- Improve code related to running code samples online

- Improve codeDiff() method for comparing differences in running results

- Improve dialog window as background content no longer scrolls with mouse

- Improve code editor style when fixing it to the right side, the bottom, and the full screen, thanks to @lishufood's suggestion

- Improve display effect of .html2md-panel panels in simple mode in simple mode

- Improve the style of configure page in settings panel

- Fix acmsguru title page editor error

- Fix issue with issue page code editor after switching between mobile/desktop version of site

- Fix a bug in getMarkdown() method that incorrectly stores data directly into DOM, causing page performance degradation

- Fixed translation buttons in collapsed blocks not showing up after turning off 'Collapsed block auto-expand', thanks to @MoYuToGo for the feedback

- Renamed the "Don't wait for page resources to fully load" option to uncheck the possible previous state as it's theoretically meaningless

- Lots of code restructuring

- ** Lots of css class renaming, ** Lots of css class renaming, ** Lots of css class renaming, ** Lots of css class renaming, ** Lots of css class renaming. Lots of css class renaming, so you may need to tweak it if you're using stylus custom styles**

- Some other tweaks and improvements



------



- Fixed ChatGPT config panel not showing up, thanks to @caoxuanming for the suggestion

- Added a config switch "Mouse Scroll Lock" which is turned on by default, thanks to @ liuhao6's suggestion



------



- Update the API of clist rating to v4, adjust the data fetching method of title page to fetch via API, thanks to @wrkwrk's suggestion

- Add ChatGPT translation "Streaming Transmission" option, on by default

- Fix the problem that Google Translation result is empty Thanks to @shicxin's feedback

- Add a configuration switch "whether to confirm code submission twice", on by default Thanks to @Rikkual's suggestion

- Add a button for small area in the full topic set page

- Fix the problem that the translation result is not shown when print on the right click of the full topic set page Thanks to @zfs732's feedback



------



- Add a code editor at the bottom of the topic page to support online code testing Code editor, support online code testing, code submission, etc. Please read the information page

- Fix the problem that inserting script button and translation result will be changed as topic description

- Improve the localization of combo mashup management page

- Add the function of "auto-translate short text", turn it off by default

- Improve the implementation of translation waiting interval, now the waiting interval will be effective globally

- Improve the implementation of "display target area range" - Improve the implementation of "display target area range", turn it on globally.

- Improve the implementation of "Show target area range" - Improve the dark mode, improve hover style of sample element, thanks to @SUPERLWR's feedback

- Add settings panel option: Translation - Filter \*\*signs in text, thanks to @Dog_E, CreMicro's feedback

- Fix the problem that Clist Rating can't be displayed correctly after turning off the "Show loading tips", thanks to @SUPERLWR's feedback. Rating was not displayed properly, thanks to Vistarin

- Some other improvements and fixes
